<script>
  function filterTracker() {
    const input = document.getElementById('trackerSearch').value.toLowerCase();
    const rows = document.querySelectorAll('#trackerTable tbody tr');
    
    rows.forEach(row => {
      const text = row.innerText.toLowerCase();
      row.style.display = text.includes(input) ? '' : 'none';
    });
  }

  function sortTracker(n) {
    const table = document.querySelector('#trackerTable tbody');
    const rows = Array.from(table.querySelectorAll('tr'));
    
    rows.sort((a, b) => {
      const aVal = a.querySelectorAll('td')[n].innerText;
      const bVal = b.querySelectorAll('td')[n].innerText;
      
      // Se for coluna de data, ordena numericamente
      if (n === 0) {
        const aDate = new Date(aVal.split('/').reverse().join('-'));
        const bDate = new Date(bVal.split('/').reverse().join('-'));
        return bDate - aDate; // mais recente primeiro
      }
      
      return aVal.localeCompare(bVal);
    });
    
    rows.forEach(row => table.appendChild(row));
  }
</script>
